alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 4:00PM EDT until June 19 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Dixie County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 13 miles north of Cross City, and moving northwest at 15 mph. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Tennille, Cooks Hammock, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Smith, Carbur, Hines, Jonesboro, Salem, Eugene, Fletcher and San Pedro Junction.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
